mappings.name: Retrieve all current EU VAT rates

countries.description: An array of the EU VAT countries and their respective rates

mappings.name: Convert a price to or from VAT price.

vat.description: The total amount of VAT applied

mappings.name: Check api requests remaining on current subscription plan

requests_remaining.description: The number of api requests remaining in the current billing period

requests_used.description: The number of api requests consumed within the last 30 days

mappings.name: Retrieve a countries VAT rates from an IP address

vat_applies.description: TRUE or FALSE, depending if country is within the EU.

amount_from.description: The amount you are converting from

amount_to.description: The result amount you have converted to

currency_from.description: The currency code you are converting from

mappings.name: Retrieve a countries VAT rates by its 2 digit country code

vat_applies.description: TRUE or FALSE, depending if country is within the EU.
